NVA Students and Families,
Based on current COVID numbers provided by the health department and local hospital capacity, we will begin school next Tuesday in phase 1. Masks are not required, but highly recommended. We will look at the data every Thursday to decide the phase for the following week. Parents, please DO NOT send your student to school with a fever or if they are feeling ill. Students who have a temperature will be sent home. Please discuss proper hygiene, healthcare, and social distancing with your student to improve our chances of staying in Phase 1. Masks, if worn, need to be worn properly and match the school dress code. Masks need to be red, white, blue, or black. They should be simple in pattern and void of words and pictures. We are looking forward to a new school year with our students.
